content.question: The data in the table show mean concentrations <math alttext="in milligrams per liter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>mg/L</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> of pollutants in rainwater leaving either green or conventional roofs. Which of the following data would be needed to calculate the total amount of a pollutant leaving the roof during and following a rainstorm?

choices.label: Distance from street level to roof
Total number of plants on the roof

skill.text: Skill 5.E: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about environmental issues.
